channel.title: Posts on Hi Spiegel
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hi Spiegel

item.title: Life is stranger than fiction because fiction has to make sense
item.description: Hi, My name is Spiegel ish. Life is stranger than fiction because fiction has to make sense. I’m weak with words and sentences. I don’t know how to talk to other people. But I’m doing my best to get over this situation. The purpose of this blog is this, and if you know me or want to know me, please bear with me. I’ll try to tell you my day x day life stories with my own very words.
